name: prius_chaser
text: A comment left by prius_chaser was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by CatJumpJohn, ohmygooses, SenseiHollywood)

name: saint
text: i love how Ray seems to be taking "Nonsense!" for a walk.

name: riazm
text: Ray Smuckles saw your lips move, but all he heard was nonsense.

name: mr_lostman28
text:
Urinate, urinate, urinate...

god damn it. Now I need to pee.

text: GOD DAMN YOU I MUST NOW URINATE ALSO

text: AND I JUST LOST THE GAME

text: Nonsense!

text: this avatar/comment combo is just... perfect

name: aaron_haynes
text: "oh great ray is doing one of his things"

name: cailetshadow
text: I love Beef's face, and I also love that he's placed almost out of the panel, emphasizing the fact that he really wants to keep walking.

name: spinynorman
text: It's like he almost continued walking, heard the word "urinate", and took two steps back into frame to give Ray a hard look and say, "...We don't need to urinate"

name: heatbag
text: Everyone needs to urinate... constantly.

name: darthemed
text: Nonsense!

name: direhaggis
text: Ray means well in trying to help others. Of course that trying can have two meanings.

name: mattfish
text: Nonsense!

name: direhaggis
text: He constantly helps people with their bizarre schemes, as much to build them up as to get himself some profit or creatively pass the time. I sense you, fish.

name: direhaggis
text: Nonsense!

name: woodenteeth
text: I have a friend who tries to interupt people like this when he knows they ain't havin a good time... but he forgets that sometimes people have to be having a bad time to sort things out: (i.e. nonsense = you shouldn't be arguing ever because I love you and you should never be not having a good time)

name: cad
text: Nonsense!

name: shoinan
text:
We've all been there - some people are having a thing, but not everyone realises it's a thing, and that in itself causes another thing.

Hella frustrating.

name: honesttom
text: Then you get a chain of awkwardness. Someone tries to back out, fails, it gets all complicated and then the party implodes.

name: rotating-dog
text: Nonsense!

name: kreuzkopf
text:
Ray is obviously still a little messed up from his bong-adventure.

That cat would have knocked them down otherwise.

name: dayvancowboy
text: Too much nonsense and he'll hit you with a car, that's how this cat operates.

name: nessotron
text: Ray is my mother in this strip. She cannot fathom the concept of a bladder.

name: lolcatdeluxe
text:
Nonsense!
*Dirty looks*

Man, Ray is an innocent.

name: laudabilis
text: I need to urinate. Right now. Good suggestion, Ray.

name: ford
text: Nonsense!

text: Oh, shit, me too!

text: Roast Beef could create an Excel spreadsheet to let a person know when they needed to urinate such as to avoid situations like this.

name: doubleclef
text: A comment left by doubleclef was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Cyberbob, Sortelli, Zem)

name: c_dizzle
text: ray is not at all phased by how irritated he's made them. i love you, ray.

name: vincentkv
text: My first Achewood, thanks to panels 6-8 cropped as someones signature. I had time, so I just went back and started from the beginning. As comic strips go, Achewood is second to only Calvin And Hobbes.

name: grunchorelaxo
text: Any Cassidy avatar merits mad chubbyin'.

name: iidebaser
text: this was my first achewood too, or at least what was playing the day I bookmarked achewood.com.

text: It's a toilet party after all.  Wouldn't go to a kegger and not use the keg, right?

name: baryonyx
text: Nonsense!

text: These comments are getting silly...

text: Nonsense ohgodnowIhatemyselfandIhavetourinate.

text:
Yeah, the page should really have stopped here, charchar pretty much covered all the available options.

Also, a homo says nonsense.

text: Ray must be doing this because he himself has to urinate. He figures that everyone else has to as well.

text: I'll give you three guesses, but just between you and me one of your guesses should be this strip right here.

text: The driving cat is cowed by the glare he received from the walking cats for butting into their conversation.

name: desert_donkey
text: she may not need to urinate NOW, but when the bitch gets in the car, it's on. girl needs to be pee like 10-15 minutes after she gets in a car. a plane, 5 minutes (but only if she has the window seat).

text: Nonsense works well with happy faces. Mad faces it's usually something like "Lies!"

text: I want you to know that I chubbied every post on this page that just read "Nonsense!" until Onstad told me to quit it
